else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is using noclip! Tell an Admin!"); disconnected = true;

So i got that but what do I add to make it so when they use it, it dont just kick, but also bans?
